revised_title: Path Integrals in Curvilinear Coordinates: Applications and Hamiltonian Approach
tldr: This article discusses the problem of summation over Feynman histories in curvilinear coordinates using a Hamiltonian approach. The author demonstrates the procedure by considering the propagator for dynamical systems in spherical polar coordinates, providing a modified form of previous results obtained by other researchers. The article also outlines the representation of operators and the integration measure in curvilinear coordinates, with a focus on spherical polar coordinates.
